channel.title: CVE Feed for McAfee,LLC -- McAfee Data Loss Prevention (DLP) ePO Extension
channel.description: The latest CVEs for McAfee,LLC -- McAfee Data Loss Prevention (DLP) ePO Extension

item.title: CVE-2021-4088|2024-08-03T17:16:03.698Z -- mcafee%2Cllc -- mcafee%20data%20loss%20prevention%20%28dlp%29%20epo%20extension
item.description: SQL injection vulnerability in Data Loss Protection (DLP) ePO extension 11.8.x prior to 11.8.100, 11.7.x prior to 11.7.101, and 11.6.401 allows a remote authenticated attacker to inject unfiltered SQL into the DLP part of the ePO database. This could lead to remote code execution on the ePO server with privilege escalation.
